TopicTitle: HypeTrain: The mechanical nature of it.

Articles.Content:
Step 1: Get model Gresley A3. Step 2: Add Paint on tender and coal to make it appear as in the picture.

Yes, but how do you make them go into metarailspace?

Yes, but how do you make them go into metarailspace?

They are small enough to be powered by the hype of the owner.

They are small enough to be powered by the hype of the owner.

Hmmm. I suppose then only a child would really enjoy this. Most model railroaders and railway modellers will admit that their obsession is dull and boring.

Well, crap. We have to invent a new class of locomotive entierly for the next HypeTrain. One of the features is aerodynamics, according to Maxmaps on Twitter. This means that we're getting a whole lot more air pressure in metaspace on the next voyage. The HypeRailway is starting to run a bit low on money after a freight service running to the SpaceX Facility crashed, so we don't have a lot of money to do this.

Luckily, there's a class of conventional steam locomotive which successfully demonstrated that a conventionally-shaped locomotive can be fitted with streamlined panels. This was the Princess Coronation Class Locomotive. Instead of totally rebuilding Hype07A, we're just going to give her a "dress."

Coronation Class without Aerodynamic Dress or with the Aerodynamic Dress

Let's hope everything goes well! It will be more of a refit and less of a rebuild this time!

so now it becomes an A4 class?
Who said they would be small?

Who said they would be small?

what? last thing I remember HYpe07A was being refitted to and A4 class to avoid drag from the new atmos

@megatiger78

That was supposed to be a reply to your older comment on that they would be small enough to be driven by single person hype.

Edited January 1, 2015 by Not-A-Rocket-Scientist

so now it becomes an A4 class?

No, because an A4 class has a remarkably different internal boiler/smokebox shape. It's more like a Princess Coronation covering over an A3. Princess Coronation was a normal locomotive underneath, but the A4 class were very strange looking underneath the aerodynamic shell.

I made something for the interior: Hype powered coffee machines. My using one of the worlds tastiest coffees, people get so exited abot I drinking it that it's enough to make a cup of coffee. It also makes hot chocolate of you want to.

Brought to you by 'Crests Baked Goodstm

I made something for the interior: Hype powered coffee machines. My using one of the worlds tastiest coffees, people get so exited abot I drinking it that it's enough to make a cup of coffee. It also makes hot chocolate of you want to.

Brought to you by 'Crests Baked Goodstm

Will put this to good use.

Wait aminute... *sniffs* There's rocket fuel in this coffee. That just cancels out the effects of both.

EDIT: Oh, wait, I accidentally rerouted the boozefuel-tanks through the coffee machine. Fixed.

Will put this to good use.

The heater was hard to make, as hype of a single person barely boils water. So we put a screen on the coffe machine, showing people enjoying their coffee. Also, the machine disperses coffee smell to make people more hyped.

Also, biscuits made by 'Crests Baked a Goods are dispensed with every cup of drink.

Also, biscuits made by 'Crests Baked a Goods are dispensed with every cup of drink.

ok I rigged a touchscreen up to it to pick the biscuits and drinks. I have a A4 shell made from hyped Mandolorian iron. I'm sure I've seen a picture of the front of an A4 lifted up and a normal train being inside. anyway that should save you some time in the design process.
May I borrow one of the older HypeLocomotives? Just Cause 3 is coming out soonish, and I need a HypeVehicle.

no. just use one of the other ones still in service, if one is used, or take a hypeplane.

Touchscreens are a huge source of antihype. I shall have no touchscreens as a part of my train! Only old keyboards with mechanical switches that make you feel so satisfied with every keypress.

Someone else is already in charge of the HypeTrain for the Just Cause series. One of the fellow engine drivers. I think his name is Bob or Kelly or something. Most of the HypeTrain drivers don't interact with their community.

Touchscreens are a huge source of antihype. I shall have no touchscreens as a part of my train! Only old keyboards with mechanical switches that make you feel so satisfied with every keypress.

so what do I do with all theses keypads?

so what do I do with all theses keypads?

Sell them for mechanical versions.

You filthy hypetrain enthusiasts, I've got something very special in the works here at Kraken Space Ind.

HINT: Think BOOM

You filthy hypetrain enthusiasts, I've got something very special in the works here at Kraken Space Ind.

Ten characters here.

I have decided to buy major shares of the company, and I now have controlling interest in your puny company. But fear not, I well let you continue your mediocre work, with minor changes. I will grant you access to my companies latest hype tech.

Also, I will give many ancient hype relics to the curator of hype. You should be thankful for my contributions, and shall provide when I request.

I have decided to buy major shares of the company, and I now have controlling interest in your puny company. But fear not, I well let you continue your mediocre work, with minor changes. I will grant you access to my companies latest hype tech.

Also, I will give many ancient hype relics to the curator of hype. You should be thankful for my contributions, and shall provide when I request.

Our company does not exist on the stock market. You can't do that. Not interested in your Hype Tech. The curator of the HypeMuseum is not associated with the Hype Transportation Company, and Hype was only discovered in the early 1800s, hardly "ancient".

And our work is not mediocre.
